text: PM #NarendraModi today launched India’s #COVID19 #vaccination drive, touted the world’s largest, with plans to reach 300 million people by August. India will administer shots to 30 million #frontlineworkers in Phase1 at 3,006 sites using Covaxin or Covishield #vaccine. #MIG https://t.co/KFjfwBhOe5
